name: hotel-booking-system
description: Hotel Booking System - Full Stack Application

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && powershell -Command "& { .\venv312\Scripts\Activate.ps1; $env:PYTHONPATH = '.\src'; python -m uvicorn booking_system.api.v1.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 }"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && powershell -Command "& { .\venv312\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install -r requirements.txt }"
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build:frontend && aws s3 sync frontend/build/ s3://booking-system-frontend-675316576819/ --profile private

author: Goce Stojcev
